name: #tubclub
description:
#tubclub is a split screen multiplayer game that puts players in control of cute rubber ducks in a bathtub that's slowly draining. Players must use the vortex current in the middle to get the jump on their opponents.

This game was created by team Just Stranger Things for TO Jam 12 where the theme was prepare for disappointment.

3D Modeling: Dawn Blair (@dawnblairr)

Audio: David Vitas (@davidvitas)

Programming: Adam Leung (@Centribo), Ian Holstead (@IanHolstead)
